item.title: How to Update This Blog
item.description: This blog is built by Hugo and deployed to GitHub Pages. When updating new contents, I use Git pushing everything to the GitHub repository, and here are some memo to myself: #1 Write a post Open cmd, cd to hugo blog local folder. hugo new posts/“new post.md” Open “new post”. Start writing by using a markdown editor (recommended). #2 Preview hugo server -D Make sure everything works fine.
